title: Are you not able to hit things that are not rendered in?
selftext:
I was working on my ak spray on ukn and when I go to about 284M on flat the targets are not rendered in anymore and when I spray where they are I do not get hits, but when they're rendered in I can hit them. are my bullets just disappearing? I know for a fact that I should be hitting the targets and my bullets are going where the target is. 

[they just don't exist I swear](https://preview.redd.it/k3aysngwfl371.png?width=1920&format=png&auto=webp&s=84105645fbf4217aff3be0adbe8887e37d84f912)
